name: Digital Ocean
message: If you click through this link, you will get $10 in free credits for Digital Ocean hosting!

name: Pebble
message: They make Smartwatches that allows you to write applications in JavaScript!

name: Interactive Resources
message: IR is a recruiting company that pays for our food each month. If you are looking switch jobs or find talent, contact Interactive Resources.

name: The CSI Companies
message: Solving Your Toughest IT Challenges. The CSI companies sponsor our BeerJS meetups.

name: Jax Tech Meetups
message: A website that lists all of the technical meetups in Jacksonville, Fl.

name: Availity
message: Availity sponsors JaxNode by hosting our monthly meetings.

name: Pluralsight
message: Pluralsight offers online interactive technical video training.

name: Electric Imp
message: The Electric Imp makes a microcontroller board that connects to WiFi.

name: Tessel
message: The Tessel is a microcontroller board that connects to WiFi and runs JavaScript and a version of Node.js
